term.title: extender

item.text: Substance, especially a diluent or modifier, added to a polymer to increase its volume without substantially altering the desirable properties of the polymer.

notes.item: An extender may be a liquid or a solid.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1985. 'Definition of terms related to polymer blends, composites, and multiphase polymeric materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2004)' on page 1995 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476111985)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
